bhujaga ābaddha mauñjiḥ ca bhujagaiḥ eva kaṅkaṇaiḥ
aṭṭahāsān sṛjānaḥ ca aśanīpāta saṃnibhān
diṇḍiḥ iti eva vikhyātaḥ gaṇapaḥ samadṛśyata
ātmanaḥ sadṛśānām ca koṭībhiḥ daśabhiḥ vṛtaḥ
gaṇapānām sura īśānām yoginām dīpta tejasām
paraḥ mahākeśaḥ mahā kāya ūrdhva mehanaḥ
nṛtyan gāyan ca citrāṇi kurvan nāṭyāni anekaśas
jvalat aṃṣṭraḥ mahā hāsaḥ bṛhat skandhaḥ pinākadhṛk
koṭībhiḥ daśabhiḥ sārdham dviguṇābhiḥ mahātmanām
gaṇānām citra rūpāṇām yugapad sampradṛśyata
siṃha āsya gaja koka āsyaiḥ dvīpi śārdūlaka ānanaiḥ

original: so 'ṣāḍhirnāma gaṇapo vyāsa tatra samāgataḥ // SkP_23.14 //
analyzed: saḥ ṣāḍhiḥ nāma gaṇapaḥ vyāsa tatra samāgataḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
atha anyaḥ vyāsa samprāptaḥ yuga anta āditya saprabhaḥ
śata yojana bāhuḥ ca digvāsāḥ ca ūrdhva mehanaḥ
ati dīrghaḥ ti meḍhraḥ ca lamba bhrūḥ sthūla nāsikaḥ
vṛtta āsyaḥ ca mahā akṣaḥ ca bhṛkuṭī saṃhata ānanaḥ
pañca yojana vistīrṇaḥ dīrghaḥ vai tāvat eva ca
daṃṣṭrāḥ catasraḥ vaktreṇa bibhrat śaṅkha indu pāṇḍarāḥ
pañca jihvā ūrdhva karṇaḥ ca pāśa hastaḥ manojavaḥ
vṛtaḥ koṭī śatena eva sadṛśānām adṛśyata
bhārabhūti iti vikhyātaḥ mahā yoga bala anvitaḥ
gaṇapaḥ devadevasya samīpam saḥ bhyagacchata
tatas kunda indu śaṅkha ābham himarāśi ambu saṃnibham
mṛṇāla sphaṭika ābham ca bhasma kakṣa avalambanam
gṛhītvā ca aśanī hāsam tri pādam cīra vāsasam
śata udaram tri śirasam tri netram ca ūrdhva mūrdhajam
jvālā mālā agra keśam ca vyāghra carma ajina ambaram
vāyu vegam mahā hāsam bhujaga ābaddha mekhalam
mahā uraga kṛta āpīḍam śaṅku karṇa ūrdhva mehanam
bhasma praharaṇam ca eva mahā daṃṣṭram mahā hanum
mahāgaṇapatim vīram jvaraḥ iti eva viśrutam

original: koṭīśatavṛtaṃ taṃ ca gaṇapaṃ so 'nvapaśyata // SkP_23.24 //
analyzed: koṭī śata vṛtam tam ca gaṇapam saḥ nu apaśyata
paraḥ saumya rūpaḥ bhasma digdha aṅgaḥ eva ca

bahu veṣa dharaḥ ca eva dhyāna yoga parāyaṇaḥ
somavarṇaḥ iti khyātaḥ koṭī śata vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
tādṛśānām gaṇādhyakṣaḥ devena āhūtaḥ āgataḥ
atha aparaḥ mahā kāyaḥ śūla pāṇiḥ mahā balaḥ
candramauliḥ mahākeśaḥ caturbāhuḥ vilohitaḥ
eka pādaiḥ mahā kāyaiḥ tri akṣaiḥ taiḥ śūla pāṇibhiḥ
vṛtaḥ koṭī śatena eva sthāṇuḥ tatra abhyavartata
paras paṭṭisena hrasva pāda udaraḥ śuciḥ
sahasra bāhu caraṇaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ pratāpavān
karāla daśanaḥ ca eva kṛṣṇa sarpa ambara chadaḥ
tryakṣaḥ candra kṛta āpīḍaḥ kaṇṭha mālā vibhūṣitaḥ

original: ugrasena iti khyātaḥ koṭīśatavṛtaḥ sa ca /
analyzed: ugrasenaḥ iti khyātaḥ koṭī śata vṛtaḥ sa ca
āgāt samīpam devasya āhūtaḥ svayam īśvaraḥ
paraḥ samāpede devam candra ardha dhāriṇam
sahasra bāhuḥ jvālā āsyaḥ mahā netra ūrdhva mehanaḥ
karāla daśanaḥ ca eva śaṅku karṇaḥ mahā nakhaḥ
asi pāṇiḥ mahā tejāḥ śata pādaḥ śata udaraḥ
tathā eva ubhayatas gatiḥ
ajaikapād iti khyātaḥ vṛtaḥ koṭī śatena saḥ
kāñcana upala vṛkṣa āḍhyaḥ sa meghaḥ iva parvataḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
āgāt tatas paraḥ vyāsa gaṇapaḥ su mahā balaḥ
sarvatas vadanaḥ śrīmān sarvatas pāṇi pādadhṛk
hrasva bāhu ūru pādaḥ ca aśanim dhārayan śubham
śataiḥ vṛtaḥ ca koṭīnām aṣṭābhiḥ tu ātmanaḥ samaiḥ

āgāt tatas paraḥ ca api vidyutkeśaḥ mahā balaḥ
candra mālā dharaḥ ghoraḥ prahasan pravicālayan
gaṇa koṭī śata vṛtaḥ paramam para tāpanaḥ
tatas paraḥ sahasreṇa koṭīnām gaṇapaḥ vṛtaḥ
sūrya mālā srajam bibhrat ājagāma mahā tapāḥ
sa sūryāpyāyanaḥ nāma devasya parama priyaḥ
dhanuṣpāṇiḥ mahā tejāḥ viśrutaḥ sa mahā dyutiḥ

original: sa nāmnā viśruto loke grahāpyāyana ityuta /

śaṅkukarṇaḥ gaṇa koṭyā mahā balaḥ
nandikaḥ ca api daśabhiḥ piṅgākṣaḥ ṣṭābhiḥ eva ca

ṣṭādaśabhiḥ tapaḥ pañcabhiḥ eva ca

analyzed: iha eva ārādhya mām devi siddhim yāsyati anuttamām
parāśara sutaḥ yogī ṛṣiḥ vyāsaḥ mahā tapāḥ
dharma vaktā bhaviṣyaḥ ca veda saṃsthā pravartakaḥ
raṃsyate saḥ pi padma akṣi kṣetre smin muni puṃgavaḥ
brahmā devarṣibhiḥ sārdham viṣṇuḥ vāyuḥ divākaraḥ
devarājaḥ tathā śakraḥ ye ca anye divaukasaḥ

original: upāsate mahātmānaḥ sarve māmiha suvrate // SkP_30.62 //
analyzed: upāsate mahātmānaḥ sarve mām iha suvrate

original: anye ca yoginaḥ siddhāś channarūpā mahāvrate /
analyzed: anye ca yoginaḥ siddhāḥ channa rūpāḥ mahāvrate
an anya manasaḥ bhūtvā mām iha upāsate sadā
alarkaḥ ca purīm etām mad prasādāt avāpsyati
sa ca enām pūrvavat kṛtvā catur varṇa samākulām

original: sphītāṃ janapadākīrṇāṃ bhuktvā ca suciraṃ nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: sphītām janapada ākīrṇām bhuktvā ca su ciram nṛpaḥ
mayi sarva arpita prāṇaḥ mām eva pratipatsyate
tatas prabhṛti cārvaṅgi ye kṣetra nivāsinaḥ
gṛhiṇaḥ liṅginaḥ vā api mad bhaktāḥ mad parāyaṇāḥ
mad prasādāt gamiṣyanti mokṣam parama durgamam
viṣaya āsakta cittaḥ tyakta dharma ratiḥ naraḥ

original: iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ so 'pi saṃsāraṃ na punarviśet // SkP_30.67 //
analyzed: iha kṣetre mṛtaḥ saṃsāram na punar viśet
ye punar nirmamāḥ dhīrāḥ sattva sthāḥ vijita indriyāḥ

original: vratinaśca nirārambhāḥ sarvato mayi bhāvitāḥ // SkP_30.68 //
analyzed: vratinaḥ ca nirārambhāḥ sarvatas mayi bhāvitāḥ
dehabhedam samāsādya dhīmantaḥ saṅga varjitāḥ

original: gatā eva paraṃ mokṣaṃ prasādānmama suvrate // SkP_30.69 //
analyzed: gatāḥ eva param mokṣam prasādāt mama suvrate
janma antara sahasreṣu yuñjan yogī yam āpnuyāt
tam iha eva param mokṣam maraṇāt adhigacchati
etat saṃkṣepataḥ devi kṣetrasya asya mahat phalam

original: avimuktasya kathitaṃ mayā te guhyamuttamam // SkP_30.71 //
analyzed: avimuktasya kathitam mayā te guhyam uttamam
atas parataram nā asti kṣetram guhyam iti īśvari

original: etadbudhyanti yogajñā ye ca yogīśvarā bhuvi // SkP_30.72 //
analyzed: etat budhyanti yoga jñāḥ ye ca yogi īśvarāḥ bhuvi

original: etadeva paraṃ jñānam etadeva paraṃ śivam /
analyzed: etat eva param jñānam etat eva param śivam

original: etadeva paraṃ brahma etadeva paraṃ padam // SkP_30.73 //
analyzed: etat eva param brahma etat eva param padam

original: vārāṇasīti bhuvanatrayasārabhūtā ramyā purī mama sadā girirājaputri /
analyzed: vārāṇasī iti bhuvanatraya sāra bhūtā ramyā purī mama sadā girirāja putri

original: atrāgatā vividhaduṣkṛtakāriṇo 'pi pāpakṣayādvirajasaḥ pratibhānti martyāḥ // SkP_30.74 //
analyzed: atra āgatāḥ vividha duṣkṛta kāriṇaḥ pi pāpa kṣayāt virajasaḥ pratibhānti martyāḥ

original: etatsmṛtaṃ priyatamaṃ mama devi nityaṃ kṣetraṃ vicitratarugulmanikāmapuṣpam /
analyzed: etat smṛtam priyatamam mama devi nityam kṣetram vicitra taru gulma nikāma puṣpam

original: asminmṛtāstanubhṛtaḥ padamāpnuvanti mokṣākhyamenasi ratāpi na saṃśayo 'tra // SkP_30.75 //
analyzed: asmin mṛtāḥ tanubhṛtaḥ padam āpnuvanti mokṣa ākhyam enasi ratā api na
iti skandapurāṇe triṃśattamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
etasmin antare devaḥ devīm prāha girīndrajām

original: prayāma dātuṃ yakṣāya varaṃ bhaktāya bhāvini // SkP_31.1 //
analyzed: prayāma dātum yakṣāya varam bhaktāya bhāvini
bhaktaḥ mama varārohe tapasā hata kilbiṣaḥ

original: arho varamasau labdham asmatto bhuvaneśvari // SkP_31.2 //
analyzed: arhaḥ varam asau labdham asmattaḥ bhuvaneśvari

original: evamuktvā tato devaḥ saha devyā jagatpatiḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas devaḥ saha devyā jagatpatiḥ

original: jagāma yakṣo yatrāste kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ // SkP_31.3 //
analyzed: jagāma yakṣaḥ yatra āste kṛśaḥ dhamani saṃtataḥ

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ bhaktyā harikeśaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā praṇatam bhaktyā harikeśam vṛṣadhvajaḥ
divyam cakṣuḥ adāt tasmai yena apaśyat sa śaṃkaram
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca
atha yakṣaḥ tadā vyāsa śanais unmīlya locane
apaśyat sa gaṇam devam vṛṣam ca evam upāśritam
devaḥ uvāca

original: balaṃ dadāni te pūrvaṃ traikālyaṃ darśanaṃ tathā /
analyzed: balam dadāni te pūrvam traikālyam darśanam tathā

original: sāvarṇyaṃ ca śarīrasya paśya māṃ vigatajvaraḥ // SkP_31.6 //
analyzed: sāvarṇyam ca śarīrasya paśya mām vigata jvaraḥ
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: tataḥ sa labdhvā tu varaṃ śarīreṇākṣatena ca /
analyzed: tatas sa labdhvā tu varam śarīreṇa akṣatena ca

original: pādayoḥ praṇatastasthau kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim // SkP_31.7 //
analyzed: pādayoḥ praṇataḥ tasthau kṛtvā śirasi ca añjalim

original: uvāca sa tadā yakṣo varado 'smīti coditaḥ /
analyzed: uvāca sa tadā yakṣaḥ vara daḥ smi iti coditaḥ

original: bhagavanbhaktimagryāṃ tu tvayyananyāṃ vidhatsva me // SkP_31.8 //
analyzed: bhagavan bhaktim agryām tu tvayi ananyām vidhatsva me
anna da tvam ca lokānām gāṇapatyam tathā akṣayam

original: avimukte ca te sthāne paśyeyaṃ sarvadā yathā /
analyzed: avimukte ca te sthāne paśyeyam sarvadā yathā
etat icchāmi deveśa dattam varam anuttamam
devaḥ uvāca
jarā maraṇa saṃtyaktaḥ sarva śoka vivarjitaḥ
bhaviṣyasi gaṇādhyakṣaḥ vara daḥ sarva pūjitaḥ
ajayyaḥ ca api sarveṣām yoga aiśvarya samanvitaḥ
anna daḥ ca api lokebhyaḥ kṣetrapālaḥ bhaviṣyasi
mahā balaḥ mahā sattvaḥ mama priyaḥ

original: tryakṣaśca daṇḍapāṇiśca mahāyogī tathaiva ca // SkP_31.12 //
analyzed: tryakṣaḥ ca daṇḍapāṇiḥ ca mahāyogī tathā eva ca
udbhramaḥ sambhramaḥ ca eva gaṇau te paricārakau
tava ājñayā kariṣyete lokasya udbhrama sambhramau
sanatkumāraḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ sa bhagavānvyāsa yakṣaṃ kṛtvā gaṇeśvaram /
analyzed: evam sa bhagavān vyāsa yakṣam kṛtvā gaṇeśvaram

original: jagāma dhāma deveśaḥ saha tena sureśvaraḥ // SkP_31.14 //
analyzed: jagāma dhāma deveśaḥ saha tena sureśvaraḥ
